name: LibriSpeech (test-clean)
description: Clean split of LibriSpeech audiobook corpus featuring high-quality recordings with minimal background noise.

metrics.name: wer
metrics.definition: Word Error Rate on the official test-clean split
metrics.calculation: (S + D + I) / N where S=substitutions, D=deletions, I=insertions, N=total words

test_method: Use the official test-clean list with provided lexicon. Most setups rely on 16kHz sampling and cased text normalization.
notes: Report whether language model rescoring or additional text normalization was applied. Provide decoder settings. The test-clean split contains high-quality recordings while test-other contains more challenging conditions.
